name: 500 Dice in the Vacuum of Space
name_original: 500 Dice in the Vacuum of Space
description:
Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022

A machine has been left in the vacuum. Inside are 500 dice, outside is a single terminal. What will you find?

This game was written entirely in Assembly. Custom assembly, in fact. The source code for the emulator and assembler can be found on this GitHub repo, and the source code for the game can be found on its GitHub repo
